title: Jeezy drops by the show!
description:
Jalen and Jacoby are joined by none other than the Snowman himself, Jeezy. He talks about his latest project, "SNOFALL" which is available right now, as well as his favorite ATL athletes of all time, squashing beef with Freddie Gibbs, and a complicated business decision about whether he should put an artist on his album! On top of that, we had a huge night of NBA games - the Suns shot down Luka, Ja put on a show vs the Knicks, and Zion bullied the Nets. Pull up!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
